Description: Textile corner-fragment of undyed linen cloth (tunic?); medium quality; one plain selvedge; end border with plaited warp fringe preceded by row of double-hitches and three self-bands. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.22 ends per 10mm and weft 11 picks per 10mm.
